DOC.detailed_description: Investigators recruit overweight obese adolescent ( BMI > 85th percentile ) parent ( ) ( BMI > 25 kg/m2 ) . Families participate one two 4-month treatment : 1 ) TEENS+Parents Coaches ( PAC ) , engage parent helper child 's weight management , 2 ) TEENS+Parent Weight Loss ( PWL ) , engage parent weight management . All adolescent participate TEENS+ , include behavioral support , nutrition education , supervise physical activity . For adolescent , intervention consist weekly 1 hour exercise session alternate weekly 1 hour behavioral nutrition group session . Parents also attend nutrition session participate behavioral parent-only biweekly group . Parent behavioral group session specific treatment arm ( e.g . PAC PWL ) . Assessments consist anthropometric measure , psychological survey , nutritional evaluation . Assessments complete baseline , post-test 3-month follow-up .
